1. DarkSpectre Browser Extension Campaigns Exposed After Impacting 8.8 Million Users Worldwide  The Hacker News
  2. Cyberhackers Just Turned 150 Browser Extensions Into Viruses - Here's How  bgr.com
  3. Zoom Stealer browser extensions harvest corporate meeting intelligence  BleepingComputer
  4. Download the FULL threat report to uncover the DNS infrastructure behind the ShadyPanda campaign: https://lnkd.in/e66GkpD8 The #ShadyPanda operation quietly persisted for 7 years, impacting an estimated 4.3 million Chrome and Edge users by abusing t  LinkedIn
